Desarrollamos aplicaciones Full Stack, e: We develop Full Stack applications, this includes creating and maintaining the system logic so that the application can function efficiently and securely. We also work on the Frontend where we design interfaces for the user.
Gestionar bases de datos, Procesar Datos: Manage databases, Process Data, Data Migration, Implement APIs, Manage authentication and authorization, Communication between Frontend and Backend using MVC model, Implement Business Logic, Integrate Third Party Services.
Diseño de Pagina, Adición de texto, imág: Page Design, Adding text, images, buttons, icons, popups and chats, Checking that all buttons work, Adaptation for different screens (Responsive Design), Setting up browser compatibility.
Backend: PHP,JavaScript (Node.js), npm,: Backend: PHP, JavaScript (Node.js), npm, Java, Laravel Framework, MVC Model, Eloquent ORM, Hash, Migrate Database, Artisan, Composer, Git. Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jquery, Ajax, Blade

Sistema para gestionar restaurantes de c: A system for managing prepared food restaurants. With this system, we can manage all aspects of home delivery food. We can add different prepared food dishes and promote them on the site, as well as add products to the shopping cart. We can also add discount coupons that customers can use when making their online purchase. We also have a blog system to promote products and/or recipes.

SEO es la sigla en inglés de Search Engi: SEO is the acronym in English for Search Engine Optimization and is a practice that consists of optimizing your web pages to rank better on search engine results pages (SERP). SEO is an effective and economical marketing strategy that helps attract traffic to a website and increase conversion rates.
